title: Calculate building CO2 emissions (PACTA 2022 version)
text: co2calculatorPACTA2022 R package provides functionality calculate carbon dioxide (CO2) emission building. calculation based norm SIA 380/1:2009 “Thermische Energie im Hochbau”.

title: Calculate CO2 emissions — calculate_emissions
text: `calculate_emissions` calculates CO2 emissions building according input arguments described .

title: Calculate CO2 emissions — calculate_emissions
code: calculate_emissions(   area,   floors,   year,   utilisation_key,   climate_code,   energy_carrier,   walls_refurb_year = NULL,   roof_refurb_year = NULL,   windows_refurb_year = NULL,   floor_refurb_year = NULL,   heating_install_year = NULL )

title: Calculate CO2 emissions — calculate_emissions
text: area Mandatory, numeric. Area (square meters) heating cooling required ("Energiebezugsfläche"). e.g. 1000 floors Mandatory, numeric. Number floors within building envelope ("thermische Gebäudehülle"). e.g. 4 year Mandatory, numeric. Year building construction. e.g. 1981 utilisation_key Mandatory, numeric. Main utilisation building according SIA 380/1:2009. following utilisations possible: 1: Wohnen Mehrfamilienhaus 2: Wohnen Einfamilienhaus 3: Büro 4: Schulen 5: Verkauf 6: Restaurants 7: Versammlungslokale 8: Spitäler 9: Industrie 10: Lager 11: Sportbauten 12: Hallenbäder Check full dataset using utilisation. climate_code Mandatory, string. Abbreviation code assigned climate station according "Auszug aus Merkblatt SIA 2028:2015". following climate stations available: ABO: Adelboden AIG: Aigle ALT: Altdorf BAS: Basel-Binningen BER: Bern-Liebefeld BUS: Buchs-Aarau CDF: La Chaux-de-Fonds CHU: Chur DAV: Davos DIS: Disentis ENG: Engelberg FRE: La Frétaz GLA: Glarus GSB: Grand-St-Bernard GUT: Güttingen GVE: Genève-Cointrin INT: Interlaken KLO: Zürich-Kloten LUG: Lugano LUZ: Luzern MAG: Magadino MVE: Montana NEU: Neuchâtel OTL: Locarno-Monti PAY: Payerne PIO: Piotta PUY: Pully ROB: Robbia RUE: Rünenberg SAM: Samedan SBE: San Bernardino SCU: Scuol SHA: Schaffhausen SIO: Sion SMA: Zürich-MeteoSchweiz STG: St. Gallen ULR: Ulrichen VAD: Vaduz WYN: Wynau ZER: Zermatt Check full dataset using climate. energy_carrier Mandatory, string. Energy carrier used heating domestic hot water production. following energy carriers available: oilHeating gasHeating walls_refurb_year Optional, numeric, default value NULL. Year wall refurbishment. e.g. 2010 Supply NULL NA refurbishment taken place since year building construction. roof_refurb_year Optional, numeric, default value NULL. Year roof refurbishment. e.g. 2010 Supply NULL NA refurbishment taken place since year building construction. windows_refurb_year Optional, numeric, default value NULL. Year window refurbishment. e.g. 2010 Supply NULL NA refurbishment taken place since year building construction. floor_refurb_year Optional, numeric, default value NULL. Year basement floor refurbishment. e.g. 2010 Supply NULL NA refurbishment taken place since year building construction. heating_install_year Optional, numeric, default value NULL. Year heating installation. e.g. 2010 Supply NULL NA heating replacement taken place since year building construction.

title: Calculate CO2 emissions — calculate_emissions
text: calculate_emissions returns list r containing calculation results:  r$heatEnergy: annual heat energy required per area, MJ/m2 per year r$emissionCoefficient: applied CO2 emission coefficient according given energy carrier, kg/MJ r$emissionsPerArea: annual CO2 emissions per area, kg/m2 per year r$emissionsTotal: total annual CO2 emissions, kg per year

title: Calculate CO2 emissions — calculate_emissions
code: # Example 1: # calculate CO2 emissions of a multi-family house built in 1981, without refurbishments ex1 <- calculate_emissions(   area = 1000,   floors = 4,   year = 1981,   utilisation_key = 1,   climate_code = "KLO",   energy_carrier = "gasHeating") str(ex1) #> List of 4 #>  $ heatEnergy         : num 458 #>  $ emissionCoefficient: num 0.064 #>  $ emissionsPerArea   : num 29.3 #>  $ emissionsTotal     : num 29343  # Example 2: # same building as above but with additional refurbishments (roof & walls) in 2010 ex2 <- calculate_emissions(   area = 1000,   floors = 4,   year = 1981,   utilisation_key = 1,   climate_code = "KLO",   energy_carrier = "gasHeating",   walls_refurb_year = 2010,   roof_refurb_year = 2010,   heating_install_year = 2010) str(ex2) #> List of 4 #>  $ heatEnergy         : num 302 #>  $ emissionCoefficient: num 0.0599 #>  $ emissionsPerArea   : num 18.1 #>  $ emissionsTotal     : num 18107
